name: Pop To The Shops - Chapter 1
description:
I want to go outside today... I want to do something... But not today... Maybe tomorrow...

Will you be able to overcome these strange dreams and go to the shops? will you be able to go outside after being trapped inside for so long? are you ok with how thing are? 

You must fight and battle these monsters, face these questions directly. There are many bad thoughts inside of your brain. If you want change you must fight for it. This is the first chapter of my indevelopment project. I plan on making 6 chapters in total for the full game, this is the first of them. I want to see what people think of my concept and ideas. I hope you enjoy it! follow me @theezui on twitter for updates on development progress. This demo / chapter one will showcase how the vibe, as well as how I intend the game to be like.
